results.content: Very explanatory and good step-by-step instructions. After completing the whole nestjs part of the course I definitely find it very comprehensive and the approach is totally adequate because it is driving you how to become able to deliver production level back end.
results.content_html: Very explanatory and good step-by-step instructions. After completing the whole nestjs part of the course I definitely find it very comprehensive and the approach is totally adequate because it is driving you how to become able to deliver production level back end.

results.content:
I am almost finishing this course, I can just say this course is awesome, I have never seen a course like this. I separated this review in three parts, nestjs,angular and both:
Nestjs: The course focuses teaching the basic of framework(controllers,services....), but this course have a differencial comparated with others nestjs`s course, it use some typescript ways , like abstract service, and I have to say it is amazing.Another topic to share is the authentication with cookie that is not metioned a lot in others courses and typeorm with relations,serializers and functions
Angular: This part focuses works like a summary, creating basic structs(services,components,event,data binding....) and after works with the api. Some topics like checkbox and abstract service I loved ,for these topics are not covered in others courses, the struct is the topic that I don't agree so much but it is understandable for it is a basic course,but I have learned so much
Both: The connection was made with awesome/amazing way, and you see how awesome is the sum of these two framework, and what we can do with them
Final Considerations: If you really want to learn nestjs ,you have to buy this course,the course cover a lot the documentation and it will provide a greate base to improve your knowledge together with angular. The course don't show the features, but implement, for example, the interceptor in most of course only console.log on terminal,in this course you use on project with funcionality,it is just an example what this course can offer,if I could rate this course with 10 stars I would do it

response.content:
Hi Davi, 
Thank you for this awesome review I didn't expect you would like it so much :). If you like this course so much I'm preparing another course: Angular + NestJs Advanced, where I will cover more advanced topics such as Redis, WebSockets, AWS etc. When I release that course I will give you a coupon :).
Keep Learning,
Antonio
